question: India has extended USD 400 million loan to which county for financing connectivity projects?
explanation:
India has recently extended a soft loan of USD 400 million (about Rs 2900 crore) to the Maldives.
The Line of Credit (LoC) has been given by Export-Import Bank (EXIM Bank), to finance connectivity projects in the Maldives. Including the current LoC, India has extended three such loans to Maldives amounting USD 1.2 billion.
